body.p: Thomas Falls states that he lived near Margolyes Tavern. I. was at his house varius times and have Staid with him several times always found plenty of Good & Substantial food for man and horse I know of the said Margolyes. buying corn of Thos Mcquiddey Given under my hand this 21st day of November 1861.

p.hi: Given under my hand this 21 Nov 1861

body.p: Sworn to before me this 21st November 1861
Edward Pate J. P. B. C.
